newsitem.title: USA: Graphic unit signs pact with Microsoft.
newsitem.headline: Graphic unit signs pact with Microsoft.

text.p: Graphic Industries Inc said Thursday its subsidiary, Wetmore & Co, has signed a licensing pact to be a select authorized replicator for Microsoft Corp.
The financial terms were not disclosed.

The agreement authorizes Wetmore to manufacture and assemble Microsoft products for Compaq Computer Corp, including the printing of documentation and collateral materials, replication of diskettes, production of CD-ROMs and related storage and order fulfillment.
The company said it expects the pact to expand in the next six months so that Wetmore may serve as authorized replicator to all suppliers of Microsoft products.
